agentUtterance.text:
Hi there! I'm a language learner companion. What language are you interested in learning? We currently only support:

• Mandarin
• Spanish
• French

Great choice! What would you like to practice today? We can:

• Learn new vocabulary
• Practice real-world scenarios
• Focus on grammar drills
Would you like to confirm your choice to focus on **Mandarin vocabulary**, or would you prefer to select a different language or practice option?

userUtterance.text: hm, maybe i want to do real world scenarios

agentUtterance.text: Would you like to confirm your choice to practice **real-world scenarios in Mandarin**, or would you prefer to select a different language or practice option?

userUtterance.text: um, i want a different language
